crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.queues !== 'object' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'name':doc.name, 'queues':doc.queues, 'queue_pin':doc.queue_pin}); }

agent_listing.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.queues !== 'object' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (i in doc.queues) { emit(doc.queues[i], doc._id);} }

agent_status.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'agent_activity' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_created, doc.agent_id], doc.action); }

agent_pins.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.queue_pin === 'undefined' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.queue_pin, null); }
